PSCT.Base: Target 1 "Altergeist" Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Altergeist" monster. You can only use 1 "Altergeist Revitalization" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
